ingredients.content: 2 tsp fine sea salt, plus extra to taste

preparations.content: Place chicken in Varoma dish, season with salt and pepper to taste then set aside.
Place garlic, huitlacoche, tomatoes, onions, oil and chillies in mixing bowl, chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>, then stir-fry <b>8 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add wine, water, sugar and 2 tsp salt, place covered Varoma into position then cook <b>30 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.
Set Varoma aside, insert measuring cup and blend <b>1 min/speed 5<b>-9, increasing speed gradually<b>. Serve chicken with sauce spooned over.
